TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FolderNameEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

Docs.summary: Provides a user interface for choosing a folder from the file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You may customize the folder options by inheriting from this class and overriding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FolderNameEditor.InitializeDialog%2A>.
